simpledb

Class IntAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.IntAggregator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aggregator

    public class IntAggregator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Aggregator
    Knows how to compute some aggregate over a set of IntFields.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface simpledb.Aggregator

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntAggregator

        public IntAggregator(int gbfield,
                     Type gbfieldtype,
                     int afield,
                     Aggregator.Op what)
        Aggregate constructor
        Parameters:
        gbfield - the 0-based index of the group-by field in the tuple, or NO_GROUPING if there is no grouping
        gbfieldtype - the type of the group by field (e.g., Type.INT_TYPE), or null if there is no grouping
        afield - the 0-based index of the aggregate field in the tuple
        what - the aggregation operator

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        public void merge(Tuple tup)
        Merge a new tuple into the aggregate, grouping as indicated in the constructor
        Specified by:
        merge in interface Aggregator
        Parameters:
        tup - the Tuple containing an aggregate field and a group-by field

      • iterator

        public DbIterator iterator()
        Create a DbIterator over group aggregate results.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Aggregator
        Returns:
        a DbIterator whose tuples are the pair (groupVal, aggregateVal) if using group, or a single (aggregateVal) if no grouping. The aggregateVal is determined by the type of aggregate specified in the constructor.
        See Also:
        for a possible helper
